Title: WCF Serial Port Transport Channels
Description: This project is aimed at creating serial port channels using WCF channel model. Several device control protocols are based on serial port and a consistent programming framework like WCF channel benefits in standardizing the design of such channels.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is aimed at creating serial port channels using WCF channel model. Several device control protocols are based on serial port and a consistent programming framework like WCF channel benefits in standardizing the design of such channels.

Please download source here.

Also please refer to documentation to setup virtual com ports.
